valveOpenTime.description: Interval (s) the valve stays open for water delivery.

lowActivityTime.description: Duration (s) BCI activity must stay low before starting anew trial.

lickResponseTime.description: Interval (s) for the animal to collect reward. Only applies if waitForLick is true.

waitForLick.description: Determines whether the animal must lick to trigger reward delivery. If false, reward is immediately delivered.

enableSoundOnRewardZoneEntry.description: Enables audio feedback on reward zone entry.

noMovementTimeBeforeTrial.description: Interval (s) subjects must not move for to start a new trial.

rewardConsumeTime.description: Interval (s) to wait for the animal to consume a delivered reward.

closePosition.description: Position (mm) of the manipulator when the spout is the closest to the animal.

farPositionOffset.description: Offset applied to closePosition to determine the furthest position the spout can travel to.

maxBciSpeed.description: Maximum speed of the manipulator in mm/s when controlled by the BCI.
